newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - New Jersey Educational Facilities.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - New Jersey Educational Facilities.

text.p: (Formerly designated as Rowan College of New Jersey Issue) NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that the Executive Director of the New Jersey Educational Facilities Authority (the Authority'') will receive SEALED BIDS with respect to the Authority's $8,970,000* aggregate principal amount of New Jersey Educational Facilities Authority Revenue Bonds, Rowan University Issue, Series 1997C (the Bonds'') at the Authority's office located at 101 College Road East, Princeton, New Jersey 08540 (the Authority's Office'') until 11:00 a.m., local time, on (the Bid Date''), and then and there, such bids will be publicly opened and announced for the purchase of all (but not less than all) of the Bonds.
The Bonds will mature on each July 1 beginning July 1, 1999 through and including July 1, 2021.

Unless all Bids applicable to the Bonds are rejected, such Bonds will be awarded at or prior to 5:00 p.m., local time, on the Bid Date at the Authority's Office to the bidder bidding such interest rate or rates and purchase price which will produce the lowest rest cost (TIC) to the Authority over the life of the Bonds. True'' interest cost shall be determined for each bid by doubling the semiannual interest rate, compounded semiannually, necessary to discount the debt service payments from the payment dates to May 1, 1997 and to the price bid, including the discount or premium, if any, and excluding accrued interest.

The Bonds are subject to optional redemption prior to maturity and may be subject to extraordinary optional redemption and mandatory sinking fund redemption, as more fully described in the Revised Official Notice of Sale and Supplement to Preliminary Official Statement.

The Bonds are offered when, as, and if issued and received by the successful bidder, subject to the approval of legality by DeCotiis, Fitzpatrick &Gluck, Trenton, New Jersey, Bond Counsel to the Authority. Copies of the Preliminary Official Statement dated March 27, 1997, the Revised Official Notice of Sale and Supplement to Preliminary Official Statement, and the Revised Official Bid Form may be obtained from the Authority's office (telephone: 609/987-0880; facsimile: 609/987-0850), from the Authority's Financial Advisor, A.H. Williams &Co., Inc., 392 Springfield Avenue, Summit, NJ07901 (908/522-8818) or 1631 Locust Street, Philadelphia, PA 19103 (215/731-2415), or from the Authority's bond counsel (609/278-1900).
